mapper.select: select f.fd_no, f.fd_name, f.fd_price, fk.fk_name from food f join foodkind fk on f.fk_no = fk.fk_no where fd_withdrawal = false order by fk.fk_no
select f.fd_no, f.fd_name, f.fd_price, fk.fk_name from food f join foodkind fk on f.fk_no = fk.fk_no
select f.fd_no, f.fd_name, f.fd_price, fk.fk_name from food f join foodkind fk on f.fk_no = fk.fk_no where fd_name like concat('%',#{fdName},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into food(fd_no, fd_price, fd_name, fk_no) values (#{fdNo},#{fdPrice},#{fdName},#{fkNo.fkNo})
mapper.select: select f.fd_no, f.fd_price, f.fd_name, f.fk_no, fk.fk_name, fk.menu_no from food f left join foodkind fk on f.fk_no = fk.fk_no where f.fk_no = #{fkNo.fkNo}
mapper.update: update food set fd_price = #{fdPrice}, fd_name = #{fdName} where fd_no = #{fdNo}
mapper.delete: update food set fd_withdrawal = #{fdWithdrawal} where fd_no = #{fdNo};
